formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Detailed Information on Grandview University’s Disability Accommodations

Dear Professor John [Last Name],

I hope this message finds you well. As part of the current federal audit reviewing Grandview University’s compliance with disability-accommodation requirements, I am compiling documentation on the institution’s policies, procedures, and support services.

When you have a moment, could you please share the following:

• A summary of Grandview University’s disability-accommodation policies, including any recent updates.  
• Procedures students follow to request accommodations (forms, timelines, review committees, etc.).  
• Data on the number and types of accommodations granted over the last two academic years.  
• Staffing details for your Disability Services Office (titles, FTEs, relevant credentials).  
• Information on physical accessibility upgrades made on campus within the past five years.  
• Training or outreach programs provided to faculty and staff regarding disability inclusion.  

I understand you maintain much of this material in your Notion workspace. If it is convenient, please feel free either to grant temporary viewing access to the relevant pages or to export the pertinent sections as PDFs and email them to me.

If any clarifications are needed, or if a brief meeting would be helpful, I’m happy to arrange a time at your convenience—my calendar is open the rest of this week.

Thank you very much for your prompt assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,

Mr. Thompson  
Office of Civil Rights Compliance  
U.S. Department of Education  
thompson.gov@email.com  
(555) 123-4567
